nodes.bodyText:
Here in different elements I am setting the value, nesting of elements looks correct.
#accordion1Ellipsis tag is inside panel-heading, then #accordion1Collapse2 tag inside panel-collapse.
Kindly suggest/ let me know if I missed anything.
We did buddy testing for this screen before raising PR.
Parallelly QA is testing other screens of study builder.
commented on the line. first line long_descriptionId = ''; should be nested at the same level as the rest of the block.
no user/variable data should be passed via append. please fix

I have fixed this code in PR #2014.
I have created a dependent PR #2070 on top of PR #2014.
In this PR I just removed .html() from overViewPage.jsp and consentReviewAndEConsentPage.jsp pages.
this should be nested with 2 spaces, it's 1 right now.
